mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_code WHERE id = #{id} AND is_stop = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_code WHERE code_type = #{codeType} AND is_stop = 0 ORDER BY code_value ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_code WHERE is_stop = 0 ORDER BY code_type, code_value ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_code (id, code_value, code_name, code_type, code_type_name, is_stop, create_user, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{codeValue}, #{codeName}, #{codeType}, #{codeTypeName}, #{isStop}, #{createUser}, NOW())
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_code SET is_stop = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
